languages.text: {n}Язык этой песни вам незнаком. Он кажется то исковерканной, грубой, хоть и не лишенной сурового благородства формой готической речи, то становится похож на рокочущий горный обвал, несущий угловатые и острые гортанные фразы, сбивающиеся в колючие рифмы.{/n}

{n}You do not know the language. The sounds seem crude and mangled but not entirely lacking the harsh dignity of a form of Gothic, while also sounding similar to the rumble of a landslide, sharp and choppy guttural phrases tumbling forth in a harsh rhythm.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Язык этой песни вам незнаком. Он кажется то исковерканной, грубой, хоть и не лишенной сурового благородства формой готической речи, то становится похож на рокочущий горный обвал, несущий угловатые и острые гортанные фразы, сбивающиеся в колючие рифмы.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你并不理解这种语言。他发出的声音似乎很粗犷，但其中却不无哥特语严酷的庄严感，听起来又有点类似于山崩的隆隆声。在刺耳的节奏声中，尖锐而粗犷的嘟囔声滚滚而来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not know the language. The sounds seem crude and mangled but not entirely lacking the harsh dignity of a form of Gothic, while also sounding similar to the rumble of a landslide, sharp and choppy guttural phrases tumbling forth in a harsh rhythm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你并不理解这种语言。他发出的声音似乎很粗犷，但其中却不无哥特语严酷的庄严感，听起来又有点类似于山崩的隆隆声。在刺耳的节奏声中，尖锐而粗犷的嘟囔声滚滚而来。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}知らない言語で歌っているようだ。発音は粗雑でまとまりなく聞こえるが、帝国後の厳しい響きがまったくないわけでもなく、同時に地滑りのうなりにも似ていて、鋭く途切れた喉奥から発せられる音が厳しいリズムを刻んでいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not know the language. The sounds seem crude and mangled but not entirely lacking the harsh dignity of a form of Gothic, while also sounding similar to the rumble of a landslide, sharp and choppy guttural phrases tumbling forth in a harsh rhythm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}知らない言語で歌っているようだ。発音は粗雑でまとまりなく聞こえるが、帝国後の厳しい響きがまったくないわけでもなく、同時に地滑りのうなりにも似ていて、鋭く途切れた喉奥から発せられる音が厳しいリズムを刻んでいる。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}No conoces el idioma. El sonido parece rudimentario y deforme, pero ves reflejada en él la dignidad del Gótico, a la vez que te recuerda el retumbar de una avalancha. Está formado por frases cortas y guturales en un ritmo áspero.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not know the language. The sounds seem crude and mangled but not entirely lacking the harsh dignity of a form of Gothic, while also sounding similar to the rumble of a landslide, sharp and choppy guttural phrases tumbling forth in a harsh rhythm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No conoces el idioma. El sonido parece rudimentario y deforme, pero ves reflejada en él la dignidad del Gótico, a la vez que te recuerda el retumbar de una avalancha. Está formado por frases cortas y guturales en un ritmo áspero.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Ce langage vous est totalement inconnu. Bien que de sonorité grossière, les syllabes gutturales se mêlent les unes aux autres en suivant un rythme rigoureux et ne sont pas sans vous rappeler la dignité brute d'une forme de gothique, tout en évoquant le grondement d'un glissement de terrain.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not know the language. The sounds seem crude and mangled but not entirely lacking the harsh dignity of a form of Gothic, while also sounding similar to the rumble of a landslide, sharp and choppy guttural phrases tumbling forth in a harsh rhythm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ce langage vous est totalement inconnu. Bien que de sonorité grossière, les syllabes gutturales se mêlent les unes aux autres en suivant un rythme rigoureux et ne sont pas sans vous rappeler la dignité brute d'une forme de gothique, tout en évoquant le grondement d'un glissement de terrain.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Du kennst die Sprache nicht. Sie klingt simpel und abgehackt, weist aber in Ansätzen die ungehobelte Würde einer Form des Gotischen auf, während sie gleichzeitig an das Rumpeln eines Erdrutschs erinnert. Scharfe und kurze gutturale Phrasen in einem harten Rhythmus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not know the language. The sounds seem crude and mangled but not entirely lacking the harsh dignity of a form of Gothic, while also sounding similar to the rumble of a landslide, sharp and choppy guttural phrases tumbling forth in a harsh rhythm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du kennst die Sprache nicht. Sie klingt simpel und abgehackt, weist aber in Ansätzen die ungehobelte Würde einer Form des Gotischen auf, während sie gleichzeitig an das Rumpeln eines Erdrutschs erinnert. Scharfe und kurze gutturale Phrasen in einem harten Rhythmus.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Bu dili bilmiyorsun. Melodisi kaba saba ve düzensiz gelse de tam olarak bir Gotik türünün haşin asaletinden yoksun değil. Diğer yandan ise gırtlaktan gelen keskin ve istikrarsız sözler, haşin bir ritimle karışarak heyelan gümbürtüsünü andırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You do not know the language. The sounds seem crude and mangled but not entirely lacking the harsh dignity of a form of Gothic, while also sounding similar to the rumble of a landslide, sharp and choppy guttural phrases tumbling forth in a harsh rhythm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu dili bilmiyorsun. Melodisi kaba saba ve düzensiz gelse de tam olarak bir Gotik türünün haşin asaletinden yoksun değil. Bir yandan da gırtlaktan gelen keskin ve istikrarsız sözler, haşin bir ritimle karışarak kulağa bir heyelan gümbürtüsü gibi geliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
